content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||54px|||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_line_height=”1.4em”]

Family Promise is the nation’s leading organization working to prevent and end family homelessness. Our holistic, community-based approach to helping families achieve stability makes us unique. Over 200 Family Promise Affiliates, located throughout the country, do this by providing prevention services before families reach crisis, shelter when they become homeless, and stabilization programs once they have secured housing to ensure they remain independent. Our Aspiration is to change the lives of 1 million children by 2030.  

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/family1.jpg” alt=”FP family” title_text=”family1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

PROGRAMS & SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

Family Promise recognizes that family homelessness and poverty are complex issues that require comprehensive, innovative solutions. Solving homelessness is not just about housing. Our holistic approach to the crisis of family homelessness includes three key areas of focus: prevention, shelter, and stabilization.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text module_class=”fp-arrow-blocks” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/programs-services/”]

  • Homelessness Prevention
  • Diversion from Shelter
  • Shelter
  • Stabilization
  • Community Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/what-we-do/programs-services/” button_text=”LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR PROGRAMS & SERVICES” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”646d2cb7-2253-43bc-bd59-786f3f03bc84″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#8D4881″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF”]

AFFILIATES

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”AFFILIATE INFORMATION” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/fpuc-atlantic-health-flu-clinic-111.jpg” alt=”FPUC clinic” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/affiliates/”]

Learn more about the work of our Affiliates.   Check out our Affiliates Volunteer FAQ and other informative resources.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”AFFILIATES PORTAL” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Cheryl-Thompson-Schuch2.jpg” alt=”Cheryl Thompson Schuch” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”https://affiliates.familypromise.org/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”]

We have a dedicated online community for our Affiliates to connect and share resources.  Log in and get more information about joining us here.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”FIND AN AFFILIATE” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/affiliate-map-2020.jpg” alt=”Affiliate Map of 2020″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/affiliates/locations/”]

Use our map search feature to find Affiliates around the country.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

FAMILY PROMISE UNION COUNTY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”FP Union COunty” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Hilltop-Bikes-3.jpg” alt=”Hilltop Bikes program” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/fp-union-county/”]

Family Promise Union County (FPUC) is overseen by the national Family Promise office.  

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”BRIDGE TO SUCCESS ” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/bridge-to-success-half.jpg” alt=”Bridge to Success program” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/fp-union-county/bridge-to-success/”]

Bridge to Success provides tailored support and necessities to families as circumstances arise to help them rebuild their lives. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

REPORTS & FINANCIALS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”18px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

At Family Promise, we know how important it is that our donors, volunteers, partners, and guests have trust in us. We are proud to have received 8 consecutive 4-star ratings from Charity Navigator, their top designation for nonprofits. We welcome you to review our financial documents and annual impact reports.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/what-we-do/reports-financials/” button_text=”View Our Reports & Financials” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”646d2cb7-2253-43bc-bd59-786f3f03bc84″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/air-2020-header.jpg” title_text=”air-2020-header” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ alt=”2020 FP Annual Impact Report” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
